   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(openssl_session_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: %% Callback functions
   26: -export([all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   34: 
   35: %% Testcases
   36: -export([reuse_session_erlang_server/0,
   37:          reuse_session_erlang_server/1,
   38:          reuse_session_erlang_client/0,
   39:          reuse_session_erlang_client/1
   40:          ]).
   41: 
   42: -define(SLEEP, 1000).
   43: -define(EXPIRE, 5).
   44: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 120}).
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: 
   50: all() -> 
   51:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   52:         true ->
   53:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   54:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'}
   55:             ];
   56:         false ->
   57:             [{group, 'tlsv1.2'}
   58:              ]
   59:     end.
   60: 
   61: groups() ->
   62:     [{'tlsv1.2', [], tests()},
   63:      {'tlsv1.1', [], tests()},
   64:      {'tlsv1', [], tests()},
   65:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], tests()},
   66:      {'dtlsv1', [], tests()}
   67:     ].
   68: 
   69: tests() ->
   70:     [    
   71:          reuse_session_erlang_server,
   72:          reuse_session_erlang_client
   73:     ].
   74: 
   75: 
   76: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   77:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   78:     {ClientOpts, ServerOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert_chains(
   79:                                  [{server_chain, ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf()},
   80:                                   {client_chain, ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf()}],
   81:                                  Config, "openssl_session_SUITE"),
   82:     [{client_opts, ClientOpts}, {server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config].
   83: 
   84: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   86: 
   87: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   88:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
   89: 
   90: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   91:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
   92: 
   93: init_per_testcase(reuse_session_erlang_client, Config) ->
   94:     ct:timetrap(?EXPIRE * 1000 * 5),
   95:     ssl:stop(),
   96:     application:load(ssl),
   97:     application:set_env(ssl, session_lifetime, ?EXPIRE),
   98:     ssl:start(),
   99:     Config;
  100: init_per_testcase(reuse_session_erlang_server, Config) ->
  101:     case ssl_test_lib:working_openssl_client(Config) of
  102:         true ->
  103:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  104:             case ssl_test_lib:is_dtls_version(Version) of
  105:                 true ->
  106:                     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls_session_reuse() of
  107:                         true ->
  108:                             ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  109:                             Config;
  110:                         false ->
  111:                             {skip, "Broken OpenSSL DTLS session reuse"}
  112:                     end;
  113:                 false ->
  114:                     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  115:                     Config
  116:             end;
  117:         false  ->
  118:             {skip, "Broken OpenSSL s_client"}
  119:     end;
  120: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  121:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  122:     Config.
  123: 
  124: end_per_testcase(reuse_session_erlang_client, Config) ->
  125:     application:unset_env(ssl, session_lifetime),
  126:     Config;
  127: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  128:     Config.
  129: 
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  132: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  133: 
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: reuse_session_erlang_server() ->
  136:     [{doc, "Test erlang server with openssl client that reconnects with the"
  137:       "same session id, to test reusing of sessions."}].
  138: reuse_session_erlang_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  139:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config),
  140:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_opts, Config),
  141:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  142:     
  143:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  144:     
  145: 
  146:     Data = "From openssl to erlang",
  147:     
  148:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  149:                                         {from, self()},
  150:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, active_recv, [length(Data)]}},
  151:                                         {reconnect_times, 5},
  152:                                         {options, [{versions, [Version]}| ServerOpts]}]),
  153:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  154: 
  155:     
  156:     {_Client, OpenSSLPort} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, [{port, Port}, 
  157:                                                                  {reconnect, true},
  158:                                                                  {options, ClientOpts}, 
  159:                                                                  return_port], Config),
  160:     true = port_command(OpenSSLPort, Data),
  161:     
  162:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Data),
  163:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
  164: 
  165: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  166: 
  167: reuse_session_erlang_client() ->
  168:     [{doc, "Test erlang ssl client that wants to reuse sessions"}].
  169: reuse_session_erlang_client(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  170:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  171:     ServerOpts = proplists:get_value(server_opts, Config),
  172:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  173: 
  174:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  175:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl, [], 
  176:                                        [{server_opts, ServerOpts} | Config]),
  177:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),    
  178:     
  179:     Client0 =
  180:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  181:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  182:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  183:                                    {from, self()}, 
  184:                                    {options, [{reuse_sessions, save}, 
  185:                                               {verify, verify_peer},
  186:                                               {versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  187:     
  188:     SID = receive
  189:               {Client0, Id0} ->
  190:                   Id0
  191:           end,
  192:     
  193:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  194:     
  195:     Client1 =
  196:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  197:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  198:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  199:                                    {from, self()},  {options, [{versions, [Version]},
  200:                                                                {reuse_session, SID} | ClientOpts]}]),
  201:     receive
  202:         {Client1, SID} ->
  203:             ok
  204:     after ?SLEEP ->
  205:             ct:fail(session_not_reused)
  206:     end,
  207:     
  208:     
  209:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  210:     %% Make sure session is unregistered due to expiration
  211:     ct:sleep(?EXPIRE*1000*2),
  212:     
  213:     Client2 =
  214:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  215:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  216:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  217:                                    {from, self()},  {options, [{versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  218:     receive
  219:         {Client2, ID} ->
  220:             case ID of
  221:                 SID ->    
  222:                     ct:fail(expired_session_reused);
  223:                 _  ->
  224:                     ok
  225:             end
  226:     end,
  227:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2).
  228:
